title: About Us
meta_description: Meet the team behind Replo. Learn about how we make customer acquisition faster and more effective for Shopify teams.
main_content: book a demo get demo get started for free log in Replo helps serious Shopify teams sell more on the Internet. Our platform helps teams craft, measure, and test winning campaigns. Replo is a cutting-edge platform designed to revolutionize customer acquisition for Shopify businesses. Our mission is to make customer acquisition faster, more efficient, and more effective for ecommerce teams. Founded in 2021 by Yuxin Zhu and Noah Gilmore, we've experienced rapid growth, surpassing 1,000 paying customers in just six months with no sales or marketing budget. To date, we’ve raised over $8.2M from Figma, YCombinator, Vercel, General Catalyst, Infinity Ventures, MAGIC Fund, Base Case Capital. We're headquartered in San Francisco. JOIN OUR TEAM Our Mission Replo is dedicated to empowering teams to craft, measure, and test winning campaigns. Our mission is to make customer acquisition faster, more efficient, and more effective for ecommerce businesses at all stages of growth. Our Expertise Replo has a deep understanding of the Shopify ecosystem and the challenges that businesses face in acquiring new customers. We have extensive experience in marketing, sales, and technology, and we are committed to providing our customers with the best possible solutions. Our Values Innovation and collaboration are at the core of everything we do. We are committed to providing exceptional customer service and maintaining the highest standards of integrity in all our interactions. Our Team Yuxin Zhu Co-founder & CEO Noah Gilmore Co-founder & CTO Sanjay Jenkins Growth Lead Aaron Lu Growth Lead Alicia Kranjc Product Lead Steven Schlaefer Head of Customer Success Darren Lee Support Lead Autumn Chung Chief of Staff Jasmine Chen Product Designer John Whiting Product Designer Ben Vogt Software Engineer Francisco Miguel Peralta Software Engineer Gabe O’Leary Software Engineer Jackson May Software Engineer Juan Cruz Paez Gordillo Software Engineer Kurt Sharma Software Engineer Martin Bavio Software Engineer Matt McAlister Integration Engineer Maxime Chemenda Software Engineer Sebastián Córdoba Software Engineer Josephine Cheng Content Marketing Specialist Mateo Delaguila SDR Babajide Ogidama Community Manager Carissa Cui Product Specialist Kevin Fang Product Specialist Ahmed Emad CSS Andres Castillo CSS Andres Pachano CSS Cristian Salazar CSS Joseph Odera Echendu CSS Leo Garcia CSS Olu Kayode CSS Shahar Yar CSS Soyket Chowdhury CSS Offsite in Mexico We enjoyed the beach, the resort, the ancient ruins, and the sun. We might have lost some brain cells. Monthly Team Dinners Third Thursdays of every month! Board games and Mario cart and poker sometimes included. Team Bonding in Alcatraz We rode a ferry and toured a historic prison. The hotdog stand in front of the ferry stop was good. Holiday Party At The New Office We christened our new office (our new home!) with live DJ music, drinks, and amazing food <3. Our Investors To date, we’ve raised over $8.2M from a diverse set of investors, including: Figma Web-based Design Tool YCombinator Venture Capital Firm and Startup Accelerator Vercel Web Hosting Platform General Catalyst Venture Capital Firm Launch your next Shopify marketing campaign with Replo Join 5,000+ Shopify teams on Replo to build, optimize, and launch high-converting campaings in minutes.
